page.title: 10HOME LIFE:WILBERLEE/HILLTOP.
page.content: When adults in the block were asked why they came to live here, the following figures emerged: Born In This Area _ 33% Father's Work _ 30% Dislike Of Town Life_ 20% Got Married _ 12% Larger House _ 5% When asked how the area had changed in recent years many people felt that it had changed very little.The pulling down of mill property and the building of the Longlands Council Estate plus some new shop development was often mentioned.A more liberal attitude to newcomers was evident although the community was still very closely knit. Few people attend Church regularly and they are predominantly pensioners. About 50% of families with children own a freezer,shop at supermarkets and use local shops for emergencies only.
